bioghist.head: Biography of Robert J. Marquard
bioghist.p: Robert J. Marquard, also known as Bob Marquard, attended Xavier University from 1947 until his 1951 graduation. During that time, he served as president of the Sodality and as a volunteer for the Santa Maria Community Center.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook of Bob Marquard documenting his life as a student at Xavier University from 1947-1951. Scrapbook contains clippings, photographs, invitations, and programs. Clippings relate to events, programs, and athletics at Xavier University. There are invitations to dances and graduation ceremonies.
